name: Rocs-Hardcore-Demolishers
title: Hard Vulcanus
author: thesixthroc
description:
Tweaks to Vulcanus. Demolishers are more numerous, the starting area is much smaller, molten lava and metals have restrictions on how they can be piped, Acid Neutralisation produces cooler steam, and coal liquefaction is nerfed. If 'V/F/G Cargo Drops Require Research' is installed, complex casting recipes are locked behind building a small science chain on Vulcanus.

Other dependencies are intended to be included, but all are listed as optional for maximum customizability. To get the full experience, enable this mod via the Space Age: Hard Mode modpack.
